trans:
Your newly designed ribbon boxes look really good. I'm delighted that you're enjoying the occupation
with the reel tapes. I think the material is in good hands with you.
My friend is currently in a nursing home. His wife needed to have an operation
and is therefore unable to look after him. It is not yet clear what will happen next.
I already had the desire for large tape recorders as a teenager. During my
education as a radio and television technician, I was able to buy a second-hand
Telefunken M24. I then restored it (new sound heads, old capacitors
replaced). I still have it, but it is currently not working. As a student I bought
a Revox A77. The electronics have been completely overhauled and the machine runs perfectly after over
50 years. I got one of the Telefunken M10s from my friend's
collection. It was built in 1961 and is a radio version (external layer). Unfortunately
I am missing the amplifier slot and the amplifier cards V397 a and V397 b for the 2nd channel.
